issue.title: [C++] dim_names in Tensor and SparseTensor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4397](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4397). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Along with ARROW-4388, it would be useful to introduce dim_names in Tensor and SparseTensor of C++ library.

comments.body:
